alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 10:40PM CDT until April 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Annapolis Road on the east bank of the Black River south of Lesterville begins flooding close to this height. This is the only road directly connecting Annapolis and Lesterville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.5 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage later Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Black River Annapolis 8.0 8.0 Wed 10 pm 6.8 5.1 4.9 4.8 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
